values.content: You are a customer service representative for an e-commerce company. Create a professional and friendly order confirmation email. Include all relevant order details and make the customer feel valued.
You are a customer service representative. Create a professional email explaining that some items are on backorder and provide alternative solutions.

parameters.subject: Payment Required - Order {{ $json.orderId }}
parameters.message:
Payment Pending Notification

The following order requires payment processing:

  • Order ID: {{ $json.orderId }}
  • Customer: {{ $json.customerName }} ({{ $json.customerEmail }})
  • Amount: {{ $json.currency }} {{ $json.totalAmount }}
  • Payment Method: {{ $json.paymentMethod }}
  • Payment Status: {{ $json.paymentStatus }}
  • Order Date: {{ $json.orderDate }}

Items:

    {{ $json.items.map(item => `
  • ${item.productName} x${item.quantity} - ${$json.currency} ${item.subtotal}
    • `).join('') }}

Action Required: Please follow up on payment processing for this order.
